amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exception from the provisions of the bill for suits arising out of the Fair Housing Act or the Equal Credit Opportunity Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 229 (Roll no. 26).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 229 (Roll no. 26).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Moore.
